verses.verse: Then he <S%H7725>brought<s%> me <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3318>flowing<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east,<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> <S%H6921>east.<s%> And the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3381>flowing<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8478>under,<s%> from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> from <S%H5045>south<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> and <S%H5437>led<s%> me <S%H5437>around<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> to the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of [the gate] that <S%H6437>faces<s%> <S%H6921>east.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H6379>trickling<s%> from the <S%H3233>south<s%> <S%H3802>side.<s%>

When the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> with a <S%H6957>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and he <S%H5674>led<s%> me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> [reaching] the <S%H9024>ankles.<s%>

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H5674>led<s%> me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> [reaching] the <S%H1290>knees.<s%> Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H5674>led<s%> me <S%H5674>through<s%> [the <S%H4325>water,<s%>] water [reaching] the <S%H4975>loins.<s%>

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand;<s%> [and it was] a <S%H5158>river<s%> that I <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5674>ford,<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> had <S%H1342>risen,<s%> [enough] <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7813>swim<s%> in, a <S%H5158>river<s%> that could not be <S%H5674>forded.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> [this]?" Then he <S%H7725>brought<s%> me <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river.<s%>

Now when I had <S%H7725>returned,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> there [were] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and on the <S%H2088>other.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H428>"These<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6930>eastern<s%> <S%H1552>region<s%> and <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6160>Arabah;<s%> then they <S%H935>go<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> being made to <S%H3318>flow<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> [of the sea] <S%H7495>become<s%> <S%H7495>fresh.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8317>swarms<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> place <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>goes,<s%> will <S%H2421>live.<s%> And there will be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1710>fish,<s%> for <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and [the others] <S%H7495>become<s%> <S%H7495>fresh;<s%> so <S%H3605>everything<s%> will <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>goes.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H1728>fishermen<s%> will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> it; from <S%H5872>Engedi<s%> to <S%H5882>Eneglaim<s%> there will be a <S%H4894>place<s%> for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets.<s%> Their <S%H1710>fish<s%> will be according to their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> like the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>
"But its <S%H1207>swamps<s%> and <S%H1207>marshes<s%> will not <S%H7495>become<s%> <S%H7495>fresh;<s%> they will be <S%H5414>left<s%> for <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

"And by the <S%H5158>river<s%> on its <S%H8193>bank,<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and on the <S%H2088>other,<s%> will <S%H5927>grow<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds of] <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food.<s%> Their <S%H5929>leaves<s%> will not <S%H5034>wither,<s%> and their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> will not <S%H8552>fail.<s%> They will <S%H1069>bear<s%> every <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>flows<s%> from the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> will be for <S%H3978>food<s%> and their <S%H5929>leaves<s%> for <S%H8644>healing.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1366>boundary<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> among the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> [shall have two] <S%H9112>portions.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> it for an <S%H5157>inheritance,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> equally with the <S%H251>other;<s%> for I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to your forefathers, and <S%H1>this<s%> <S%H2088>land<s%> shall <S%H776>fall<s%> to you as an <S%H5307>inheritance.<s%>

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1366>boundary<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> from the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> [by] the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon,<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H6657>Zedad;<s%>

<S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> <S%H1268>Berothah,<s%> <S%H5453>Sibraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> Hazer-hatticon, <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2362>Hauran.<s%>

"And the <S%H1366>boundary<s%> shall <S%H1961>extend<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%> [to] Hazar-enan [at] the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%> This is the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

"And the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2362>Hauran,<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [shall be] the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> from the [north] <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H6931>eastern<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> you shall <S%H4058>measure.<s%> This is the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

"And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%> [shall extend] from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of Meribath-kadesh, to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> [of Egypt, and] to the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%> This is the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

"And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> from the [south] <S%H1366>border<s%> to a point <S%H5227>opposite<s%> Lebo-hamath. <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>
"So you shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> among yourselves according to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> it by <S%H5307>lot<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> among yourselves and among the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> who <S%H1481>stay<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst.<s%> And they shall be to you as the native-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> they shall be <S%H5307>allotted<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that in the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H1481>stays,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> [him] his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
